detailsSection: This PowerPoint deck contains a placeholder to recap the BDM’s priorities, the Microsoft enterprise platform value proposition, a high-level overview of the IO model, and a proposed approach for tailoring and designing the implementation of the solution. This PowerPoint deck is used to present the Microsoft enterprise platform value and to seek permission to form a Solution Implementation team to pursue solution design and architecture. This deck needs to be customized to reflect (or at least indicate) the BDM’s priorities. The TDM Conversation Sheet can be used as an illustration during this discussion.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
